    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: from pandas import (
    4:     Categorical,
    5:     Series,
    6: )
    7: 
    8: 
    9: def test_nunique():
   10:     # basics.rst doc example
   11:     series = Series(np.random.default_rng(2).standard_normal(500))
   12:     series[20:500] = np.nan
   13:     series[10:20] = 5000
   14:     result = series.nunique()
   15:     assert result == 11
   16: 
   17: 
   18: def test_nunique_categorical():
   19:     # GH#18051
   20:     ser = Series(Categorical([]))
   21:     assert ser.nunique() == 0
   22: 
   23:     ser = Series(Categorical([np.nan]))
   24:     assert ser.nunique() == 0
